attributes.action: HELP: Crimes Against Humanity, WAR Crimes & Human Rights Violated Harm & Redress
attributes.additional_details:
Redress Schemes to ‘Register Victims Complaints’ as elements of Crime Against Humanity etc, to Stop Missed Crimes.

Compel redress teams to reveal statistics on atrocities, esp planned elements of atrocities. 

Define agencies & pros stated in clauses of public authority redress schemes, as also public authorities (HRA S.6)

With Major Wars & Conflicts in the world: eg Tigray War - Russian & Ukraine War. UK law must set a GOLD Standard Example in Redressing harm & stop accountability prevention.
attributes.background:
UK Govt must 'STOP Impunity' issues & recognition failures of historical, present & future Crimes Against Humanity etc. 

Govt to Stop bad practices in #Investigation #Admin & #Pay Out of Public Authority Redress Schemes. To reduce omission & error in reported elements of War Crime etc, below how.

rejection.details: We can see you'd like the Government to take action on crimes against humanity, but it's not clear what you'd like the Government to do, or what you mean by "redress schemes". A petition must ask for a clear action from the Government or Parliament.
